definitions.definition: A person with a broad general knowledge , especially one with more than superficial knowledge in several areas and the ability to combine ideas from diverse fields.
Species which can thrive in a wide variety of environmental conditions. A eurytopic species.

main_definition: A person with a broad general knowledge , especially one with more than superficial knowledge in several areas and the ability to combine ideas from diverse fields.
secondary_definitions: ( ecology ) Species which can thrive in a wide variety of environmental conditions. A eurytopic species.
